summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing continued employment of the WOFAC Cooperation as expert consultants to study and make recommendations regarding workload planning in said Department, increasing the expenditure allowance in Object of Expenditure "3000 - Other Services & Charges" in Program Category "Executive Management" (Code 1100) in the 1975 Budget of the Engineering Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
